name: @liquify/schema
description: JSON Schema stores used in Liquify

scripts.build: node ./generate.cjs && cp LICENSE package/LICENSE && cp readme.md package/readme.md
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run build && cp package.json package/package.json
scripts.postpublish: rm -rf package/package.json && rm -rf package/readme.md && rm -rf package/LICENSE
